  • pub - Main public object (available after running easyrtc.listen();)

    • pub.util - Utilities Object
    • pub.appObj - Application Object (available after creating an application)
      • pub.appObj.connectionObj - Connection Object
      • pub.appObj.roomObj - Room Object
